snippet: Three women who disappeared separately about a decade ago, when they were in their teens or early 20s, were found alive in a residential area near downtown Cleveland, and three men were arrested.
abstract: Three young women from Cleveland who disappeared nearly a decade ago are found, and appear to be physically unharmed; police identify women as Amanda Berry, Gina DeJesus and Michelle Knight, and arrest three men in connection with episode.
lead_paragraph: Three women who disappeared separately about a decade ago, when they were in their teens or early 20s, were found alive in a residential area near downtown Cleveland, and three men were arrested.

headline.seo: Three Women, Gone for Years, Found in Ohio
headline.main: Three Women, Missing for Years, Found in Cleveland
headline.print_headline: Three Women, Gone for Years, Found in Ohio
